meta.name: description
meta.content: Mason Independent School District is located in Mason, TX.

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 900px; height: 300px;

div.div: The mission of Mason Independent School District is to prepare every student to reach his or her maximum potential and become a responsible member of society.
Location: Mason High School, 924 E College Ave, Mason, TX 76856, USA

March 31, 2020
Dear Mason ISD Parents and Staff,
Given the rapidly evolving situation of COVID-19, and adhering to Governor Abbott’s executive order, Mason ISD will remain closed until Monday, May 4th. This is in an effort to support our nation’s need to slow the spread of the virus.
Mason ISD will continue to provide instruction through “home-based learning”, meals to students, and homework packet distribution in the same manner in which we have been providing the past two weeks. Our teachers and staff will continue to be available via email and/or phone between the hours of 8:00am – 3:30pm on Monday through Friday.
We have been in contact with Hill Country Telephone Company (HCTC) regarding the possibility of them providing free internet access, during the school closure period, to students who currently do not have service. Please let us know if do not have internet access at your residence and we will work to get you set up with a representative from HCTC. They will contact you to schedule an appointment but we must first let them know who needs it. You can either email me or your campus principal to be added to the list.
Thank you for your patience and understanding during this difficult time. We miss being able to see all of our students on a regular basis and look forward to the day when we can return to regular operating schedules.
Please keep our school, community, state, and nation in your prayers.
Dada la rápida evolución de la situación de COVID-19, y siguiendo la orden ejecutiva del gobernador Abbott, Mason ISD permanecerá cerrado hasta el lunes 4 de mayo. Esto es en un esfuerzo por apoyar la necesidad de nuestra nación de frenar la propagación del virus.
Mason ISD continuará brindando instrucción a través del "aprendizaje en el hogar", comidas a los estudiantes y distribución de paquetes de tareas de la misma manera que hemos estado proporcionando las últimas dos semanas. Nuestros maestros y personal continuarán disponibles por correo electrónico y / o teléfono entre las 8:00 a.m. y las 3:30 p.m. de lunes a viernes.
Hemos estado en contacto con Hill Country Telephone Company (HCTC) con respecto a la posibilidad de que proporcionen acceso gratuito a Internet, durante el período de cierre de la escuela, a los estudiantes que actualmente no tienen servicio. Háganos saber si no tiene acceso a Internet en su residencia y trabajaremos para que pueda configurarlo con un representante de HCTC. Se comunicarán con usted para programar una cita, pero primero debemos informarles quién la necesita. Puede enviarme un correo electrónico o al director de su campus para que lo agreguen a la lista.
Gracias por su paciencia y comprensión durante este momento difícil. Echamos de menos poder ver a todos nuestros estudiantes de manera regular y esperamos con ansias el día en que podamos regresar a los horarios operativos regulares.
Por favor mantenga a nuestra escuela, comunidad, estado y nación en sus oraciones.
Sincerely, Stan Whittle Mason ISD Superintendent
The MJH 8th graders at the UT Hall of Fame on their field trip to the university.
